messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] now: milking cows was:life too boring for unschooling?
messages.msgSnippet: We are a little far...  SE Minnesota. But anytime you feel like coming here you are more than welcome. Alex ... From: Kidgie@aol.com To:
messages.messageBody:
We are a little far... SE Minnesota. But anytime you feel like coming here you are more than welcome.
Alex


----- Original Message -----
From: Kidgie@...
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2007 3:06 PM
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] now: milking cows was:life too boring for unschooling?



In a message dated 6/27/2007 12:46:26 P.M. Pacific Daylight Time,
polykow@... writes:

We don't give any " lessons" on milking cows but if any of you ever want to
come milk some we can certainly show you how.

are you near me? i'd love it!! (southern ca) and so would the kids :) we
were just talking about how we (julian, my 4 year old and i) want a farm-like
home, so we can have fresh eggs, fresh milk and grow more veggies. right now, we
live in Cementsville, lol (j/k!) and have no yard and a micro-poch where we
have some containers of plants and few veggies.

one day.

love,
Karen
(PS_ i see there are 2 karen's here! shall i be k2?)
